languages.text: "В отличие от остальных, ее образ начал проявляться все четче — утонченные черты старческого лица, длинные белые волосы, горящие алым глазницы... и третье око. Око навигатора". {n}Плечи Кассии содрогаются от нахлынувших воспоминаний.{/n} "Однажды старуха сорвалась с места и принялась душить меня прямо во время варп-перелета! Слава милости Его, в тот момент мне удалось прогнать ее на задворки сознания. Однако старуха лишь обозлилась".

traits.locale_text: "В отличие от остальных, ее образ начал проявляться все четче — утонченные черты старческого лица, длинные белые волосы, горящие алым глазницы... и третье око. Око Навигатора". {n}Плечи Кассии содрогаются от нахлынувших воспоминаний.{/n} "Однажды старуха сорвалась с места и принялась душить меня прямо во время варп-перелета! Слава милости Его, в тот момент мне удалось прогнать ее на задворки сознания. Однако старуха лишь обозлилась".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Unlike the others, her image manifested itself more clearly each time: the refined features of her elderly face, the long white hair, the empty eye sockets glowing scarlet... and the third eye. The eye of a Navigator." {n}Cassia's shoulders shake from the memories flooding in.{/n} "Once, in the middle of a warp voyage, the old woman dashed toward me and started strangling me! Praised be His mercy, for I was able to banish her to the fringes of my consciousness at that moment. However, that only angered the old woman."
languages.original_text: "В отличие от остальных, ее образ начал проявляться все четче — утонченные черты старческого лица, длинные белые волосы, горящие алым глазницы... и третье око. Око навигатора". {n}Плечи Кассии содрогаются от нахлынувших воспоминаний.{/n} "Однажды старуха сорвалась с места и принялась душить меня прямо во время варп-перелета! Слава милости Его, в тот момент мне удалось прогнать ее на задворки сознания. Однако старуха лишь обозлилась".

Praised be His mercy, for I was able to banish her to the fringes of my consciousness at that moment. However, that only angered the old woman."

languages.text: “她和其他人不同。每次出现，她的形象都会变得越来越清晰——她年迈而精致的面孔，她长长的白发，空洞的眼窝里猩红色的光芒……还有她的第三只眼，那是导航者的眼睛。”{n}回忆涌入了卡西娅的脑海中，她的肩膀不住地颤抖着。{/n}“有一次，在亚空间航行期间，那个老妇人突然冲向了我，开始掐我的脖子！赞美仁慈的帝皇，我成功地将她驱逐到了意识的边缘。然而，我的反抗却让那个老妇人更加愤怒。”
languages.original_text: "Unlike the others, her image manifested itself more clearly each time: the refined features of her elderly face, the long white hair, the empty eye sockets glowing scarlet... and the third eye. The eye of a Navigator." {n}Cassia's shoulders shake from the memories flooding in.{/n} "Once, in the middle of a warp voyage, the old woman dashed toward me and started strangling me! Praised be His mercy, for I was able to banish her to the fringes of my consciousness at that moment. However, that only angered the old woman."

traits.locale_text: “她和其他人不同。每次出现，她的形象都会变得越来越清晰——她年迈而精致的面孔，她长长的白发，空洞的眼窝里猩红色的光芒……还有她的第三只眼，那是导航者的眼睛。”{n}回忆涌入了卡西娅的脑海中，她的肩膀不住地颤抖着。{/n}“有一次，在亚空间航行期间，那个老妇人突然冲向了我，开始掐我的脖子！赞美仁慈的帝皇，我成功地将她驱逐到了意识的边缘。然而，我的反抗却让那个老妇人更加愤怒。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Unlike the others, her image manifested itself more clearly each time: the refined features of her elderly face, the long white hair, the empty eye sockets glowing scarlet... and the third eye. The eye of a Navigator." {n}Cassia's shoulders shake from the memories flooding in.{/n} "Once, in the middle of a warp voyage, the old woman dashed toward me and started strangling me! Praised be His mercy, for I was able to banish her to the fringes of my consciousness at that moment. However, that only angered the old woman."

languages.text: «A diferencia de las demás, su imagen se manifestaba de forma más clara cada vez. Los rasgos refinados de su anciana cara, los largos cabellos blancos, las cuencas oculares vacías con brillo escarlata... y su tercer ojo. El ojo de una Navegante». {n}A Cassia le tiemblan los hombros al recordarlo.{/n} «Una vez, durante un viaje por la disformidad, ¡la anciana se abalanzó sobre mí para intentar estrangularme! Alabada sea la misericordia del Emperador, porque pude desterrarla a los extremos de mi consciencia en ese momento. Sin embargo, eso solo enfureció a la anciana».
languages.original_text: "Unlike the others, her image manifested itself more clearly each time: the refined features of her elderly face, the long white hair, the empty eye sockets glowing scarlet... and the third eye. The eye of a Navigator." {n}Cassia's shoulders shake from the memories flooding in.{/n} "Once, in the middle of a warp voyage, the old woman dashed toward me and started strangling me! Praised be His mercy, for I was able to banish her to the fringes of my consciousness at that moment. However, that only angered the old woman."

traits.locale_text: «A diferencia de las demás, su imagen se manifestaba de forma más clara cada vez. Los rasgos refinados de su anciana cara, los largos cabellos blancos, las cuencas oculares vacías con brillo escarlata... y su tercer ojo. El ojo de una Navegante». {n}A Cassia le tiemblan los hombros al recordarlo.{/n} «Una vez, durante un viaje por la disformidad, ¡la anciana se abalanzó sobre mí para intentar estrangularme! Alabada sea la misericordia del Emperador, porque pude desterrarla a los extremos de mi consciencia en ese momento. Sin embargo, eso solo enfureció a la anciana».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「他の人とは異なり、彼女のイメージは回を重ねるほどに明瞭になっていきました。年老いた顔に浮かぶ洗練された表情、白く長い髪、緋色に光る空の眼窩…そして第三の目。航宙士の目」{n}カシアの肩が、溢れ出す記憶に震える。{/n}「一度だけ、ワープ航行の最中に、その老婆が私に向かって駆け寄り、首を絞め始めたことがあったのです！主の慈悲をたたえることで、その瞬間、私は老婆を意識の片隅に追いやることができました。ですが、それはその老婆を怒らせただけだったのです」
languages.original_text: "Unlike the others, her image manifested itself more clearly each time: the refined features of her elderly face, the long white hair, the empty eye sockets glowing scarlet... and the third eye. The eye of a Navigator." {n}Cassia's shoulders shake from the memories flooding in.{/n} "Once, in the middle of a warp voyage, the old woman dashed toward me and started strangling me! Praised be His mercy, for I was able to banish her to the fringes of my consciousness at that moment. However, that only angered the old woman."

traits.locale_text: 「他の人とは異なり、彼女のイメージは回を重ねるほどに明瞭になっていきました。年老いた顔に浮かぶ洗練された表情、白く長い髪、緋色に光る空の眼窩…そして第三の目。航宙士の目」{n}カシアの肩が、溢れ出す記憶に震える。{/n}「一度だけ、ワープ航行の最中に、その老婆が私に向かって駆け寄り、首を絞め始めたことがあったのです！主の慈悲をたたえることで、その瞬間、私は老婆を意識の片隅に追いやることができました。ですが、それはその老婆を怒らせただけだったのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Im Gegensatz zu den anderen hat ihr Bild sich jedes Mal deutlicher manifestiert: die edlen Züge ihres alten Gesichts, die langen weißen Haare, die leeren, rot glühenden Augenhöhlen ... und das dritte Auge. Das Auge einer Navigatorin." {n}Cassias Schultern erzittern ob der Erinnerungen, die sie überfluten.{/n} "Einmal kam die alte Frau inmitten einer Warp-Reise auf mich zugestürmt und fing an, mich zu würgen! Gepriesen sei seine Gnade, denn ich konnte sie in diesem Augenblick an den Rand meines Bewusstseins verbannen. Doch das erzürnte das alte Weib nur."
languages.original_text: "Unlike the others, her image manifested itself more clearly each time: the refined features of her elderly face, the long white hair, the empty eye sockets glowing scarlet... and the third eye. The eye of a Navigator." {n}Cassia's shoulders shake from the memories flooding in.{/n} "Once, in the middle of a warp voyage, the old woman dashed toward me and started strangling me! Praised be His mercy, for I was able to banish her to the fringes of my consciousness at that moment. However, that only angered the old woman."

traits.locale_text: "Im Gegensatz zu den anderen hat ihr Bild sich jedes Mal deutlicher manifestiert: die edlen Züge ihres alten Gesichts, die langen weißen Haare, die leeren, rot glühenden Augenhöhlen ... und das dritte Auge. Das Auge einer Navigatorin." {n}Cassias Schultern erzittern ob der Erinnerungen, die sie überfluten.{/n} "Einmal kam die alte Frau inmitten einer Warp-Reise auf mich zugestürmt und fing an, mich zu würgen! Gepriesen sei seine Gnade, denn ich konnte sie in diesem Augenblick an den Rand meines Bewusstseins verbannen. Doch das erzürnte das alte Weib nur."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Contrairement aux autres, je la vois chaque fois un peu plus distinctement : ses traits raffinés, son visage parcheminé, ses longs cheveux blancs, ses orbites vides brillant d'un éclat écarlate... et son troisième œil. L'œil d'une navigatrice. » {n}Cassia se met à trembler, submergée par l'émotion alors qu'un souvenir lui revient en mémoire.{/n} « Une fois, lors d'un voyage dans le Warp, elle s'est jetée sur moi et a commencé à m'étrangler ! Par la grâce de l'Empereur, j'ai réussi à la bannir dans les confins de ma conscience à temps, mais ça n'a fait que l'énerver encore plus. »
languages.original_text: "Unlike the others, her image manifested itself more clearly each time: the refined features of her elderly face, the long white hair, the empty eye sockets glowing scarlet... and the third eye. The eye of a Navigator." {n}Cassia's shoulders shake from the memories flooding in.{/n} "Once, in the middle of a warp voyage, the old woman dashed toward me and started strangling me! Praised be His mercy, for I was able to banish her to the fringes of my consciousness at that moment. However, that only angered the old woman."

traits.locale_text: « Contrairement aux autres, je la vois chaque fois un peu plus distinctement : ses traits raffinés, son visage parcheminé, ses longs cheveux blancs, ses orbites vides brillant d'un éclat écarlate... et son troisième œil. L'œil d'une navigatrice. » {n}Cassia se met à trembler, submergée par l'émotion alors qu'un souvenir lui revient en mémoire.{/n} « Une fois, lors d'un voyage dans le Warp, elle s'est jetée sur moi et a commencé à m'étrangler ! Par la grâce de l'Empereur, j'ai réussi à la bannir dans les confins de ma conscience à temps, mais ça n'a fait que l'énerver encore plus. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Diğerlerinin aksine o kadının sureti, her seferinde daha da netleşti: Yaşlı yüzünün kibar hatları, uzun ak saçı, al al parlayan boş göz yuvaları... Ve üçüncü gözü. Bir Rotacı gözü." {n}Anılar aklına geldikçe Cassia'nın omuzları sarsılıyor.{/n} "Bir keresinde, bir öteboyut yolculuğunun ortasındayken bu kocakarı koşarak yanıma gelip beni boğazlamaya başladı! İmparator'un merhametine şükürler olsun ki o anda o kadını bilincimin uzak köşelerine defedebildim. Ne var ki bunu yapınca daha da sinirlendi."
languages.original_text: "Unlike the others, her image manifested itself more clearly each time: the refined features of her elderly face, the long white hair, the empty eye sockets glowing scarlet... and the third eye. The eye of a Navigator." {n}Cassia's shoulders shake from the memories flooding in.{/n} "Once, in the middle of a warp voyage, the old woman dashed toward me and started strangling me! Praised be His mercy, for I was able to banish her to the fringes of my consciousness at that moment. However, that only angered the old woman."

traits.locale_text: "Diğerlerinin aksine o kadının sureti, her seferinde daha net bir hâle geldi: Yaşlı yüzünün kibar hatları, uzun beyaz saçı, al al parlayan boş göz yuvaları... Ve üçüncü gözü. Bir Rotacı gözü." {n}Anılar aklına geldikçe Cassia'nın omuzları sarsılıyor.{/n} "Bir keresinde, bir öteboyut yolculuğunun ortasındayken bu kocakarı koşarak yanıma gelip beni boğazlamaya başladı! İmparator'un merhametine şükürler olsun ki o anda o kadını bilincimin uzak köşelerine defedebildim. Ne var ki bunu yapınca kocakarı daha da sinirlendi."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
